translations.editor.placeholder2: What do you have in mind today?
translations.dialogs.welcome.title: Welcome to Productiva Mente!
translations.dialogs.welcome.description: Productiva Mente is a web application for task and note management.
translations.dialogs.welcome.feature3: Local storage to ensure your privacy
translations.dialogs.welcome.feature4: Dark mode for a better experience
translations.about.description-text: Productiva Mente is a web application for task and note management designed with the Material design line.
translations.about.features-text: Productiva Mente is free and open source, allowing you to use and contribute to the project at no cost. It guarantees your privacy by storing all data locally in your browser. It offers an uninterrupted experience by not including advertisements, and features a Markdown editor for notes, task management with priorities, responsive interface, dark mode, and offline functionality.
translations.notes.no-notes: You don't have any notes created, create a new note to get started.
translations.tasks.no-tasks: You don't have any tasks created, create a new task to get started.
translations.tasks.title: Title
